= visincr =

== Intro ==
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cause I'm 3D programmer, edit matrix is one of my pain work. I often write code like

{{{
mat.m11 = 1.0f, mat.m21 = 1.0f, mat.m31 = 1.0f, mat.m41 = 1.0f;
mat.m12 = 1.0f, mat.m22 = 1.0f, mat.m32 = 1.0f, mat.m42 = 1.0f;
mat.m13 = 1.0f, mat.m23 = 1.0f, mat.m33 = 1.0f, mat.m43 = 1.0f;
mat.m14 = 1.0f, mat.m24 = 1.0f, mat.m34 = 1.0f, mat.m44 = 1.0f;
}}}

so that is this script save me from the hell. Just try to visual-block the "1" row, 
and type :I, you will smile like me.
